Class FluenceOfXAndYAndZAndStartingXAndYDetector

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Detectors
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements IDetector. Tally for Fluence(x,y,z) and starting (x,y). Note: this tally currently only works with discrete absorption weighting and analog

public class FluenceOfXAndYAndZAndStartingXAndYDetector : Detector, IHistoryDetector, IDetector
